verses.name: John 12:38
verses.text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled, which he spake, Lord, who hath believed our report? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed?

verses.name: John 12:39
verses.text: Therefore they could not believe, because that Esaias said again,

verses.name: John 12:40
verses.text: He hath blinded their eyes, and hardened their heart; that they should not see with their eyes, nor understand with their heart, and be converted, and I should heal them.

verses.name: John 12:41
verses.text: These things said Esaias, when he saw his glory, and spake of him.
